brief:
General construction elements comprise what appears to be concrete slab foundation, pile foundation, concrete ring wall, concrete flooring, timber flooring, brick cladding, timber weatherboard cladding, vertical timber cladding, horizontal timber cladding, plaster cladding, concrete cladding, fibre cement sheet cladding, tile cladding, steel cladding, concrete block cladding, aluminium joinery, double glazed aluminium joinery, timber joinery, metal roof, tile roof, longrun steel roof, concrete tile roof, metal tile roof, plasterboard, soft board, hard board, tile ceiling and plaster ceiling.
The interior appears to be mostly timber framed with plasterboard or of similar linings.
chattelsBrief: We have included in our valuation an allowance for chattels including blinds, curtains, drapes, fixed floor coverings, light fittings, stove.
